title: 2019 Best Celebrity Halloween Costumes [Photos]
text:
Photo: Jessica Biel as Justin Timberlake and Justin Timberlake as Justin Timberlake’s microphone.

For some spine-tingling, skin-crawling reason, as of Thursday last week, America’s celebs (and, sure, the rest of us ghouls) have declared it open season on Halloween, All Hallow’s even though we remain days away from the main event. On the bright side, this opens up the possibility for multiple celebrity Halloween costumes over the course of two full weekends. On the dark-sided side, Chrissy Teigen (and, sure, the rest of us goblins) is left with an observation we all have to agree with.

I have never seen a longer Halloween in my life. — christine teigen (@chrissyteigen) October 27, 2019

Surely we’ve had a Halloween on a Thursday before? How did we handle it? Did we celebrate during the weekend before or after? How will this affect the nation’s wig delivery schedules? Obviously more is more, so hopefully the celebs who have donned a costume already will re-up, while the more conservative amongst them can hang back and see whose outfit they have to beat. We warn you now: Stormi is coming in with some heat. Check out our (every-expanding) collection of celebrity Halloween costumes below.

Gabrielle Union-Wade and her sweet baby Kaavia channel Bring It On, significantly lowering the earth’s temperature with an unseasonable amount of Clovers in the atmosphere.

In a year of J. Lo, Lisa Rinna gives you one J. Lo more.

bella_baskin: It’s Britney bitch pic.twitter.com/rP15lQqJ8W — Demi Lovato News (@itsJCMD) October 27, 2019

One Halloween weekend down, and Demi Lovato has already delivered two looks: Casual Marie Antoinette, and Sexy Pennywise.

Nina Dobrev contracts an ocean eye infection as Billie Eilish.

Cardi B administers life-saving medicine for whatever’s wrong with your ass.

Jessica Biel is to early 2000s Justin Timberlake as Justin Timberlake is to a sentient microphone.

Meanwhile, Halsey channels Dope Show-era Marilyn Manson…

As well as ‘70s-era Cher, who definitely laid a lot of the groundwork for Manson’s subsequent looks.

And the winner so far? Why, it’s baby Stormi, here dressed as mom Kylie Jenner at this year’s camp-themed Met Ball. Wait, okay, is this… actually camp? No? Okay, what if Kylie dressed as her baby dressed as Kylie Jenner at the Met Ball for Halloween Week 2? We’re going to figure this one out. After all, we have all week.
description: Halsey, Jessica Biel, Justin Timberlake, Stormi, Kylie Jenner and Demi Lovato are among the celebrities breaking out their 2019 Halloween costumes this weekend.
